website_summaries.verdict: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen Lotion is recommended by the Skin Cancer Foundation as a very effective sunscreen.
pros: Fast-absorbing and lightweight enough to use on your face and body
cons: Some have said it caused them to break out

customer_reviews.title: It sucks
customer_reviews.text: Highly disappointed My husband used another brand and he didn’t get burn like my daughter and I did. We applied every hour and a half for 8 hours and we burned like crazy. Did not help us my daughter and I have a bad sunburn on our faces and shoulders. Also it did not moisturize skin. Will not use again.
customer_reviews.author: Elvira P.

customer_reviews.title: Caused my mild facial psoriasis to flareup, severe itching, redness, swelling!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of all the positive reviews, but after the first use all the sensitive areas on my face turned red and swelled up and the itching was intense!!! I have mild facial psoriasis and this caused the worst flareup I have ever had -- had to usie my psoriasis hydrocortisone cream to calm the itching and redness and swelling, and I will not be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: EffieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job at sunburn protection, but burns eyes.
customer_reviews.text: The sunscreen is effective. On a day with a UV index of 11, I put it on in the morning and was outside all day swimming without reapplying and never even turned pink. This is great for my pale Irish skin. On the does-it-work scale, this is 5-stars. The down-sides? It isn't shine free. It's pretty greasy looking, but doesn't feel that way on your skin. Secondly, for use on your face, keep it far away from your eyes. It burns for about 30 minutes if it gets in your eye and it doesn't take much to feel that way. While this is a great sunscreen, you will need something else for your face.
customer_reviews.author: Mikul

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my husband after doing research to find dermatologist recommended sunscreen for those with pre cancerous skin on the face. He is outside most of the time and has a hard time finding a sunscreen that will protect his skin, stay on his skin, not drip off with sweat, not irritate skin, and not leave a white film on the skin. This sunscreen is the answer for all those issues. It is lightweight, stays on with sweat, no need to reapply often, not irrigating to the skin, no white film left behind, and protects really well. Thank goodness, our sunscreen search is over!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Summer
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something light to wear over your regular moisturizer this works very well. It looks white straight from the container but goes on sheer and makes your skin look more radiant. I wore this while out and about this weekend and didn't get burned from the searing sun. With temperatures in the 90s all weekend it was great to know I wasn't going to get sunburnt. So I used this on my face and arms and it didn't affect my skin at all. No breakouts or oily residue. Just comfortable clean complete coverage. I'm happy. I'll buy this again. ~The Rebecca Review
customer_reviews.author: The Rebecca ReviewTop Contributor: Jigsaw Puzzles

customer_reviews.title: I really like this sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sunscreen. It doesn't feel heavy on the face and didn't cause me to breakout, I have acne prone skin. It also did not cause irritation on my children's sensitive skin and didn't look ghostly on their skin or mine , we are of a tan - deeper complexion. I'd repurchase and recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: CryHTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Intense burning eyes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to where surfing and felt i made the best choice when it advertised, dry touch. Thinking it won't run into my eyes! I was dead wrong... I wore it several times and every time I wanted to rip my eyes out of my skull because the burning was so intense. DO not let this product run into your eyes from your forehead! hands, cheeks and feet it worked fine, but heed my warning!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man

customer_reviews.title: Received USED product!!
customer_reviews.text: I know I love this sunscreen because I use it regularly but in the past I’ve bought it from Rite Aid/CVS. When I saw the price was cheaper on here of course I jumped on it- but boy was that a mistake. The bottle I received was missing the protective seal and 1/2 empty if not more. My sunscreen in my bathroom (same brand of course) has more than the “brand new” one I just received on Amazon. So disheartening that they would send used product and don’t check this! I want my money back. What a waste of time too.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Contains Oxybenzone, destroys coral reefs
customer_reviews.text: Two ingredients that we know to be killing the coral reefs are found in many sunscreens: Octinoxate, and Oxybenzone. This sunscreen contains the latter. Even if you don't care about the environment (why not!?) you probably aren't a fan of hurricanes and tropical storms. Coral reefs protect beaches from erosion, mitigating the damage these storms, which are increasing in frequency and intensity. If you think life on this planet matters, please choose something else.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Darling

customer_reviews.title: Not s advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It isn't "light" it goes on thick. It doesn't spread far, so you will need alot to cover a small area. It IS greasy! If you have hairy arms, it will ball up the hair. And you'll still feel greasy after you try and shower it off. NOT what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: theenoid

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect!
customer_reviews.text: I used this today before running errands. I was in and out of the sun for no more 30 minutes, when I returned to my car my cheeks were very pink as was my chest. I even applied twice to my cheeks to block rays from hitting my age spots and they still burned. I think I was in the sun for only 20, no more than 30 minutes. I have fair skin and am rarely in the sun, but I feel a sunscreen that is truly 100 spf should have at least kept me from burning for the short amount of time I was in the sun. I am very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: terri

customer_reviews.title: Got Sun Burn BAD despite SPF 100 Rating
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe, but I got Sun Burn very bad while using this SPF 100 lotion; I need a high SPF because I burn easy; There is only one other SPF 100 lotion I know of (think "banana") and it DOES work (used it for years); So why did I switch to this brand? It was covered under my HSA program, so it was "like free." How did I know it was sunburn? I decided to stay out of the sun for a few days and the itching stopped, and swelling and redness went down (the healing began); I'm going back to what I was using!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: It gave me a really bad rash it felt like my skin was burning itchy and very uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's thick so a little goes a long way and I feel like I'm getting better coverage
customer_reviews.text: I've used this brand for years and it has earned its reputation.I'm surprised that I prefer it on my face over the thinner liquid that comes with the dry touch for face which also costs more. Even though my t-zone gets oily, this cream does not make my face greasy and causes no breakouts. It's thick so a little goes a long way and I feel like I'm getting better coverage. You get so much quantity for the price and the product is easy to find. I am careful with use around the eye area, though. Great price and free delivery on Amazon! Product arrived quickly and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Crumpet

customer_reviews.title: Darker complexions beware
customer_reviews.text: So I used this product for several weeks now and I am not too crazy about the ashy/gray tint on my face after using it. I have brown skin so it is very obvious when I use this product. It takes me a couple of minutes to rub it into my skin to make the gray/white hue go away. However if you have combination skin it doesnt leave your face too sticky/oily which I like. As for my fellow darker skin people make sure you allot like 5 mins rubbing that really well on your face.
customer_reviews.author: Doitz1

customer_reviews.title: Neutrogena is reliably awesome
customer_reviews.text: No white residue. Feels like heavy moisturizer going on & then just disappears! Great in water. Won’t make you look weird. NON-COMEDOGENIC!!!! Stop spending $$$$ on skincare. Neutrogena & Olay are all you need. Do you know why those 2 brands work but don’t cost a fortune? The high end brands use some new supposedly miraculous ingredient. Rich ladies spend astronomical amounts of cash on those products. If they truly work then Neutrogena & Olay use those ingredients. So you can pay a fortune to be a test bunny or just use products that are tried & true!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Peaster

customer_reviews.title: Not an everyday sunscreen unless you’re on a boat
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for an every day facial or light body sunscreen I would say don’t get this it’s very sick and very much like a sunblock and does not want to come off in the shower it’s good if you’re going to be on a boat or out in the sun and swimming I only use it on my tattoos it’s really thick and pasty
customer_reviews.author: kittymagik

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way! Does a fantastic job
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen. Protecting my face and ears and neck are very important as skin cancer runs in my family. I had gotten a trial size of this and loved it so much I bought a bigger 3 oz size. I love how little you need and the fact that make up goes over it flawlessly. It doesn't leave my face greasy looking if I choose to go makeup free! I even got my husband using it. It is airplane size friendly and lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kate B.

customer_reviews.title: Use it Everyday!
customer_reviews.text: I use this lotion on me and my kids everyday. It doesn't seem to be greasy and my daughter (2.5) tolerates me rubbing this on her more than other creams that leave her with visible white cream. This was recommended to me by my dermatologist and it is safe for kids. Obviously I try to keep it off of my son's (7months) hands, but it doesn't sweat into their eyes. I do recommend keeping a wide circle around the eye area because it does burn if you get it in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: R.N.

customer_reviews.title: It's kinda over priced for minimal protection
customer_reviews.text: I would only recommend this for your face and nose but be aware that the tube is very tiny and only lasts maybe 1 month of repetitive recommended use. I still get burnt using it but I'm also out side working on a farm, little color is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Ray K

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This review is for Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Water Resistant and Non-Greasy Sunscreen Lotion 100 SPF. I don't like a lot of sunscreens because they are too greasy. This is the second year I have used this specific Neutrogena lotion and I love it. It does not make me feel sticky or greasy. Worthwhile purchase and will continue to purchase this brand in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best sunscreen EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and most effective sunscreen I have ever used! I take medication that makes me very sensitive to the sun (photosensitivity) and the last couple years I have just suffered after 30 minutes in the sun. I have tried everything then decided to try this after seeing all the great reviews. I put it on 30 minutes prior to going outside and I have literally spent hours in my pool almost every day with no problems! And I never have to reapply even after sweating and swimming. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: ~michelle~

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a bad rash on my neck
customer_reviews.text: I had a really bad reaction to this and have bumps and a rash all over my neck where I put this product. I use other other sun blocks whenever I go outside and none have given me this type of reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dry-touch is no joke
customer_reviews.text: i hate oily sunscreen so i picked this one because it says ultra sheer dry-touch, and they are not kidding. this sunscreen feels so dry that i need to add lotion on top after. I'm not complaining since that's what i asked for, but i was surprised by how "dry-touch" it was, but still very easy to spread.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my dermatologist, excellent sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: So I'm 8x at risk for skin cancer compared to the average person... therefor the dermatologist told me I could either go outside for 8 hours per week with no sun protection to limit the risk of cancer or apply this stuff multiple times daily so I can go out and about and be free as a bird. It moisturizes well. people tell me I look ten years younger than I am and I think it's bc I have been putting this stuff on for years... can't guarantee it'll make you look younger but I wonder if that's the cause or if it's just genetic.
customer_reviews.author: akula

customer_reviews.title: A+ Product and Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This is the only sunscreen I ever use! I live in sunny Cali - the Golden State. I have a tendency to burn badly, so I make sure to slather this on before heading out. It is really thick, and you definitely feel it on your face. It also has a weird mediciney smell, and makes your eyes sting when it drips down mixed with sweat. But,it does the job and prevents sunburn like no other! I've never had a sunburn using this product, and this is an amazing price for such high SPF.
customer_reviews.author: WanderingStar

customer_reviews.title: Good but ....
customer_reviews.text: The cap was broken but luckily it didn't effect the product and it can still close effectively. I like the way it felt on the skin and it hasn't bothered my skin yet, not greasy at all
customer_reviews.author: janel patin

customer_reviews.title: Works great for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my little ones. They are fairer skinned and burn. Tied it for the first time when we had a bounce house with a water slide and pool. We were outside for at least 4 hours and they had no sign of redness after being in and out of the pool and in the sun the whole time. Used it again on a vacation trip to Disney and in the pool there with the same results. Multiple days in the sun with no sunburn. Goes on easy and feels drier to the touch than most sunscreens I have used. Started using it myself as I am out in the sun most days. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: E.P.

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT PROTECT YOUR SKIN!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually bother with reviews, but I want to warn people. This product DOES NOT work. I burn very easily so I made sure that I covered myself completely. It didn’t help at all. I went back to the room to find my whole back, shoulders, chest, and face was bright red. The product dried out my skin slightly, not enough to cause pain, but enough to become itchy. The only good thing about the product is the smell. The scent isn’t too potent. It’s on the softer side so you don’t reek of sunscreen as you walk around. I wouldn’t recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Avila

customer_reviews.title: Received “expired” product without tamper seal
customer_reviews.text: It’s well known that sunscreen effectiveness lasts no more than 2yrs however the bottle I was given was manufactured in 2014. There is no manufacturer protective/tampering prevention seal on product. However, I’m not 100% Neutrogena places one on there to begin with. I’d prefer to have one when purchasing refillable items to make sure I’m not getting a prior return that had filler placed in it to normalize product weight.
customer_reviews.author: JT818

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't leave your skin greasy
customer_reviews.text: I love that sunscreen, it does not leave the skin greasy, it does not let the skin burn when it is exposed to the sun for a long time, after a while the skin is very soft and radiant, you only have to use a small amount for your face because it works perfectly. It doesn't have any smell, though.
customer_reviews.author: Marce Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect
customer_reviews.text: I fell and the weed eater ate my face... you can imagine the damage... as I learned how to lessen the scaring that could happen with all the stitches and such... I picked this product... I knew the Neutrogena name and when it said 100 sunblocks I said that's the one for me... I put it on once the stitches came out and found that is was cooling on my face, no clogging, no stinging and somehow it made me feel better about the possible scaring... I mix it at night with other oils to keep the scars from tightening... and it helps... plus the no zit feature is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works on my super fair complexion.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best sun screen for my very fair, easy to burn skin. I can stay outside longer without worry of get sunburned. I like the dry touch formula. It doesn’t make my skin look all shiny or break out. This is good stuff! I hope this is helpful for you.
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Death Mask
customer_reviews.text: It leaves a lovely white mask on the lovely blaque girl. Its very thick and DOES NOT ABSORB into your skin at all. Sweat?! FORGET ABOUT IT! WHITE RESIDUE everywhere. Everywhere there was a crease in my body a white line of the lotion formed. The search continues.....
customer_reviews.author: Netta Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Burns my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed to write this because I really wanted to like this product. It goes on smooth although I do have to blot my nose frequently during the day. The big problem is burning my eyes. I've never had this happen before and I am careful not to put it on my eyelids and too close to my eyes. It does have to go near my eyes for sun protection. I'll use it for other areas, but if your eyes are sensitive you may want to look into Pacifica sunscreen for the face. That one doesn't burn my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Compton

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunscreen Protection
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews on this before purchasing. It is the first sunscreen I have found that is not greasy! I wear it over my regular moisturizer and under my makeup. Does not make my makeup clot or smear throughout the day! I also bought some for my young adult son who is in college. He raves about it also. All other sunscreens he had tried made his skin greasy and shiny. Not this product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bugsnaps

customer_reviews.title: SPF is good but there are a couple of issues
customer_reviews.text: While I like the SPF level, the overall lotion isn't my favorite. The lotion is sticky and drys quickly, which makes it a little hard to spread. I work outside, and my main issue, was that it made my eyes burn if sweat got in my eyes. I haven't had this issue with other sunscreens. On the plus side, there was no strong odor and it doesn't leave your face unnaturally white.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Two downsides that are kind of a "duh" but should be noted anyway: 1) It will leave white streaks unless you rub it in very well. If you sweat it off, that sweat will be white. At least that way you know you need to reapply 2.) Don't Put It Near Your Eyes. The stinging is incredible. As in, incredibly annoying. Other than that, it works very well. Used it for outdoor work 10 hours a day for over a month with nary a sunburn.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca FioreTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my "ginger" of a hubby NOT BURN in the Jamaican sun!
customer_reviews.text: JUST returned from Jamaica and THIS WORKS GREAT! My husband is a "ginger" (red hair and burns so badly when exposed to sun) he kept saying "Honey, I can't burn! You don't understand, I can't burn!" before we left. So I got this and WHALAA!!! NO BURN! We were in the ocean, and in the pool with a swim up bar most of the day, we kept reapplying it about ever 1.5 - 2 hours. This is wonderful stuff! Thick and rich and does take a little more time to work it into the skin, but it was so worth it! My husband came back from Jamaica BURN FREE and so did I!!! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: nursetype

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't wish it on my worst enemies
customer_reviews.text: Without sweating during my 5 minute walk, the sunblock somehow got into my eye. It burned so much I cried at work in one eye with snot oozing out of one nostril.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: Leaves white marks on the skin, doesn’t really dry out and stays sticky for a long time, burns your eyes and you can’t even return it. Don’t bother with this item and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Mony 007

customer_reviews.title: Good level of SPF for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, lightweight SPF that I have been using on top of my moisturizer and under my foundation. There’s no smell which is nice but I do find it takes a little work to be fully absorbed but it does appear to last well and doesn’t effect the application of my make up.
customer_reviews.author: Kate E Davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I had Mohs surgery on my left cheek. When the bandage came off I had a 4 inch scar from cheek bone to jaw. I was so upset... my dermatologist suggested Kelo Cote ...walaaaa immediately I mean immediately within one week you could see a true change with the look of the scar. I realize it takes time for the skin to settle down but I am a hairdresser so I am familiar with skin tissue I'm telling everyone who will be faced with mohs surgery this product is AMAZING!! Simply amazing Just have faith
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality...
customer_reviews.text: First of all, this sunscreen burns on my face and irritates it tremendously! After 2 weeks I noticed it separated and needed to be shaken. Extremely disappointed with the product!
customer_reviews.author: katejeronimo

customer_reviews.title: High SPF and High Price
customer_reviews.text: I needed some 100 SPF lotion to protect one of the kids recent stitches from forming a scar. The doctor recommended getting an SPF 100 lotion for this purpose. This Neutrogena lotion was the only one I found. Time will tell if there is a scar or not, nut I thought $9 was too steep for a 3 ounce tube.
customer_reviews.author: allyk

customer_reviews.title: Better sunscreen than most other brands
customer_reviews.text: Works great for protection from the sun in the summer. The only problem is it's leaves some irritation on sensitive skin, which my daughter has. But overall a good product, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Le

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with this brand
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid brand, and I bought the 100+ for my wedding outside in August because I know it won't give me oily nasty skin but still be strong enough to last for hours. Being such a high SPF, it does cake on pretty thick, but that's what keeps my vampire skin from blistering under the day moon and fooling the mortals once again. :)
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!! I purchased this during the summer when I was doing a treatment on my face in which I wasn’t supposed to be exposed to much sun, but you know I had to get my tan on! This IS AMAZING. My face did not burn once this summer and it works as a moisturizer for me too. I put a little powder foundation over it and I’m set! Definitely will buy again next summer!
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: I usually use this after a chemical peel it protects my face against harmful UV lights that would normally burn my face. The product dries fast with no sticky feeling afterwards. Nice If you would like to apply as a base to makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica1

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I made a gift basket for my dad for his next cruise and included this sunscreen. He’s the type that has EXTREME sun sensitivity and will burn and blister severely. This thing actually protects him. Granted, he still wears and hat and long sleeve shirt but this does help. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: annette828

customer_reviews.title: So far great under my makeup
customer_reviews.text: I work in the garden and spend some time outside. I put this on my face, chest and neck them add some makeup.. so far the 2 together have worked perfectly l, cant tell I have sun screen on. Feel like I am protecting my face and body from the sun. I love this product and have no bad things to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Chemical Sunscreen - JUST WATCH YOUR EYES
customer_reviews.text: It’d be a fantastic chemical-only sunscreen that applies easily, has a light but pleasant smell; it’s a great option for anyone concerned with the casts that mineral sunscreens can leave. This product stings my eyes like nothing I’ve ever put near them. It’s obviously some chemical with the sunscreen mixture, but for me, the eye stinging is unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Parrett

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t work for me but it can work for you
customer_reviews.text: I like Neutrogena and I was using the protection 55 one, but this one makes my skin very sticky and if I put a lot for a sunny day I get acnes in the next day. Maybe is gonna work for you, but not for me (my skin type is mixed, not dry and not oiled)
customer_reviews.author: Sean Wikman

customer_reviews.title: Okay but drying
customer_reviews.text: This was fine. I think this would definitely be good for arms, shoulders, back of neck, etc. I wouldn't use it on the face. My face felt very irritated after using it, even though I put it in moisturizer before. It was very drying. Still, it seems like it would be good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Rach

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both have sensitive skin and this is the best for us it’s super dry after you put it on not greasy at all and really protects from the sun definitely give it time to dry first before getting wet I noticed that it looked like it was coming off when I didn’t give it enough time to set up my daughters skin when we jumped into the pool I think they said 15 minutes before
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Boroughs

customer_reviews.title: Very skeptical
customer_reviews.text: I was exited at first to buy the product. However, after it came it looks fake. Almost like it is imitation. I was not comfortable using it outside. I used a little bit of it and it was not as smooth as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Love having so much sun protection on my face, as I develop melasma very easily. It does spread well, although it is thick, so I always add a little bit of water to my skin before I apply it so it’s moves on. Just watch out though – it can get clogged in your eyebrows😉
customer_reviews.author: Laura G.

customer_reviews.title: Good size and not slippery, great for hiking
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and how dry it feels. This is a life saver for hiking. Earlier, I went to beehive in Maine, the hiking trail notoriously known for the slipperiness and steep angles. I have no problem fitting the sunscreen into my Fanny pack and a few other essentials. The sunscreen on my hand doesn’t affect my climbing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works like it says it should
customer_reviews.text: To me this is the holy Grail of sunscreen lotions. Oh my God, this stuff is top notch. I cannot express to you how much this stuff protects your skin. I did have to reapply after swimming in the lake for two hours but come on who wouldn’t have to reapply? Regardless my family and I did not to burn at all as long as we put this lotion and Another Neutrogena spray sunscreen. This stuff is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo A Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Best sun protection for face!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this sunblock for a few years now and absolutely love it! I lather it on my kids faces and it helps protect them from getting sunburn. It keeps their faces moisturized from the high wind at the beach. My boys are 11 & 14 (teens) and this product didn’t clogged their pores or breakout. This is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Great skin protection from sunlight
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty cool in terms of protection, but it so thick and greasy that I didn't like. Overall protection is great and the product is very useful in the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Mohd Ali

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My nose always gets really burnt when I’m working in my garden. Since I started putting this on before I go out no mor burns.
customer_reviews.author: PAC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very effective but expensive when looking at it from a dollars per ounce perspective. Compared to other sunscreens this is more expensive than would be sustainable unless you make good money and just don't care but sunscreen is a stupid thing to be pretentious about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: I buy this because it's affordable. I have very sensitive skin and it makes me break out but I still use it because I haven't found anything better that works best for my skin and that's 100 SPF protection. It leaves a white cast on your skin but if you keep rubbing your skin it will disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Arshanie

customer_reviews.title: don't use
customer_reviews.text: I used this for several years and then I started having a bad reaction to it. Fluid filled welts that itch and scale over.i can not use it anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Excelent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really good product. It protects a lot from sun and feels good in skin. A tip to apply is that you make three lines of product in three of your fingers and this is a good quantity so you can have the product for more time and also apply an ideal quantity. Also use your ring finger because this is the one with less pressure and will be more gentle to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Bare Satisfactory Protection
customer_reviews.text: Used at beach for three hours, with 2 applications applied heavily, I left burned. The sunscreen was not greasy and moisturized my skin but the protection factor which was the main reason of purchase was severely disappointing, would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Thais Porto

customer_reviews.title: BUY.IT.NOW!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this product! I strictly use this one on my face everyday. I then put my normal moisturizer on top after I’ve given it a few minutes to soak in. My skin looks AMAZING when I do this. It gives a nice youthful glow all day long, not to mention how soft it makes me skin. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked pretty well
customer_reviews.text: This went on very well, dried quickly, and didn't leave a greasy feel. It sound silly, but it was hard to know where exactly we stopped spreading when we needed to get more out of the bottle and keep applying. It rubbed in so quickly we didn't know where we left off and needed to keep applying. So we ended up with a few pretty burnt patches on our soon, but it worked well otherwise! My only other complaint is that it didn't go very far. We are both average size and this bottle lasted 3-4 days with whole body application to two people.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Reddington

customer_reviews.title: It suitable for all skin types but not so

customer_reviews.author: Juliana

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, leave your skin with a dewy finish
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! This is my second time re-purchasing this. I apply this every morning before I do my makeup! It does leave your skin with a dewy finish and will most likely affect the look of your makeup. My foundation came on easier and more natural with this product. If you prefer a matte look, you can always apply powder afterward. Overall this is a great sunscreen with broad spectrum SPF! It will protect your skin against both UVA and UVB rays.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy at all!
customer_reviews.text: Really works well on my skin. Feels thick so feels like it's working well. But doesn't feel greasy or get gritty. Love this for my face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: D. Overbye

customer_reviews.title: Got a rash

customer_reviews.author: K. Moore

customer_reviews.title: NOT A 100+

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get sun-burned in 115-120 F sun, so this sunscreen seems to work. It smells like an average sunscreen. Not exactly good or bad, but closer to good than bad. It's small enough for carry-ons.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: great sun protection, not greasy

When I heard Neutrogena made a sunscreen with 100 spf, I decided to try it. I spent more than 4 hours outdoors in the bright Colorado sun and got absolutely no sunburn. Normally that amount of sun would toast me. This stuff is GREAT! Not at all greasy and has a light, pleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Pelton-Roby

customer_reviews.title: I love this sunscreen so much!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sunscreen so much! It has an awesome sun protection, I love that it is 100+ SPF! And it is great for my oily skin! Every time I finish it, I buy another one here! It is my go to sunscreen, I use it daily! I totally recommend it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Truthfully Honest Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great just what the misses and son was looking for, you see they have very sensitive skin and cannot use just any sunblock or sun screen, this one worked amazing for them and didnt had any bad reactions, I will be getting a more in the future
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Naranjo

customer_reviews.title: White cast.

customer_reviews.title: Not the  best for being invisible

customer_reviews.author: ginger

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful

customer_reviews.author: Wilkinson Power

customer_reviews.author: Claire C.

customer_reviews.title: Greasy feel that stays on
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the same as it used to be. It goes on greasy and stays greasy until it's washed off. Actually makes you feel hotter...so not what I was looking for. Used to have a dry feel. This is uncomfortable. Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to absorb but great sun protection
customer_reviews.text: Neutrogena has always been a go to for me. I gave this product five stars despite the slow absorption rate because sun protection is a higher priority for me. It smells nice and you can always layer small amounts so it’s not as difficult to absorb. It will leave white streaks until it dries (which is not long).
customer_reviews.author: Teresa R

customer_reviews.title: Goes on easily and works so well
customer_reviews.text: I work hard outside almost everyday in the hot sun. This is my favorite sunscreen. It works, it lasts and it goes on fast. I *hate* the gloppy stuff that leaves white streaks on your skin. This one is so much better and turns clear right away. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Hevnar Homes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product that doesn't make my face shine after a couple of hours, plus the scent if not overpowering and the white cast is not as noticeable as some other people said
customer_reviews.author: Miguel. R

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Used on trip last month to Hawaii. Perfect. even with 100SPF, still tanned -- but no burn. i did use Maui Babe (tanning lotion) on top. customer_reviews.author: R BTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not for men with facial hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying a lot of sunscreen lotions and moisturizers over the fast few weeks (looking for one that doesn't clump on my facial hair) and this has to be one of the worst. I have to really work it in on the smooth areas of my face to prevent streaks. I have short clean facial hair and no matter how long i try it clumps up and looks like dandruff when dried. I would only recommend for high sun use(going to beach) where looking nice on your face doesn't matter so much or for use on your hands where you can rub in well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it, nice texture

customer_reviews.author: Cindy Mitchell

I did not use it all it’s could be harmful to my skin . I do not recommend buying it . I’m not buying again form the seller

customer_reviews.title: Rash on 1 child, 3 children with sunburn
customer_reviews.text: Burned my son (8 years old) immediately after I put it on. Ruined his day since the burning did not stop. Regardless of the # of showers/washing face he did. His 3 siblings ended up with sunburns. Was reapplied hourly, while using this product. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to apply on my new tattoo - it definitely protects well! I got slightly sunburned on my arm around my tattoo, but where I applied the sunscreen... it was perfectly fine. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: taylermacdonald

customer_reviews.author: Elliott S.

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job but on the dry side
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do what it says. I live in Trinidad (it's in the Caribbean so extra warm whether most days. Beautiful place. Google it.) and I have dark skin like Ms. Michelle Obama's. My only qualm with this is that it applies super dry to my already dry skin so I need to mix it with a moisturizer. You definitely cannot use this alone under makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya

customer_reviews.title: Leaves white residue everywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for when I ride with the top down in my car. I waited till after I had several chances to try the product before I left a review. customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: My husband gets sun burns very easily and we brought this on a float trip we took a little while ago and we only applied once in the morning and he was good all day. customer_reviews.author: Deidra Johnson

product_meta.title: Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Water Resistant and Non-Greasy Sunscreen Lotion with Broad Spectrum SPF 100+, 3 fl. oz
product_meta.description:
Get powerful sun protection without the heavy finish with Neutrogena Ultra Sheer Dry-Touch Sunscreen. This lightweight Broad Spectrum SPF 100 sunscreen lotion with Dry-Touch technology absorbs fast for a clean, ultra-light feel and non-shiny finish. This SPF 100+ sunscreen is formulated with Helioplex Technology, which offers superior broad spectrum protection from aging UVA rays and burning UVB rays. Fast-absorbing, lightweight and water-resistant, this non-greasy sunscreen lotion formula is non-comedogenic and PABA-free. Apply prior to sun exposure to keep skin protected during outdoor activities like gardening, biking, hiking, boating or going on a walk.

BRAND STORY
By Neutrogena
